mapper.select: SELECT ROLE_ID, ROLE_PID, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_LEVEL, IF(ROLE_TYPE='group', TRUE, FALSE) ROLE_PARENT, IF(ROLE_LEVEL=0, TRUE, IF(ROLE_LEVEL=1, TRUE, FALSE)) ROLE_OPEN, ROLE_VALID FROM SYS_ROLE WHERE ROLE_PID=#{0} ORDER BY ROLE_LEVEL, ROLE_INDEX

SELECT DISTINCT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROLE_ID, ROLE_PID, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_LEVEL, ROLE_INDEX, IF(ROLE_TYPE='group', TRUE, FALSE) ROLE_PARENT, IF(ROLE_LEVEL=0, TRUE, IF(ROLE_LEVEL=1, TRUE, FALSE)) ROLE_OPEN, TRUE ROLE_CHECKED, ROLE_VALID FROM SYS_ROLE WHERE ROLE_ID IN (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM USER_ROLE_REL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ) UNION SELECT ROLE_ID, ROLE_PID, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_LEVEL, ROLE_INDEX, IF(ROLE_TYPE='group', TRUE, FALSE) ROLE_PARENT, IF(ROLE_LEVEL=0, TRUE, IF(ROLE_LEVEL=1, TRUE, FALSE)) ROLE_OPEN, FALSE ROLE_CHECKED, ROLE_VALID FROM SYS_ROLE WHERE ROLE_ID NOT IN (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM USER_ROLE_REL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ) ) T WHERE T.ROLE_PID = #{roleId} ORDER BY T.ROLE_LEVEL, T.ROLE_INDEX
